channel.title: Finally joining the Gauntlet
channel.description:
Hello all!
Iâ€™ve been listening to +1 Forward and Gauntlet podcasts for a while now, and I figured it was finally time to drop in to join this community after hearing about the awesome games you all get to play every month.
I actually got into PbtA and BitD because of this community about a year agoâ€¦ Thank you!! Right now my home group is getting ready to run a Star Wars-skinned Starforged coop campaign.
(PS, I apologize if this isnâ€™t the proper place to put a hello thread.) ðŸ˜…

item.title: Finally joining the Gauntlet
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

BattleDrumz:

And yes @RichRogers, I feel like we could be friends. I so wish I could hop into one of your Bounty of the Week or Hutt Cartel gamesâ€¦ they seem exceedingly popular, though.

Hey there Luke, welcome to the forum! Glad you like the podcast, weâ€™re always open to feedback.

As for BotW and Hutt Cartel, they are pretty popular, Iâ€™m happy to say. I may run a new series in a few months.

Rich

item.title: Finally joining the Gauntlet
item.dc:creator: @BattleDrumz
item.description:
@BattleDrumz wrote:

Haha, thanks @HorstWurst, @Alun_R. Funny thing, Rich and Rachâ€™s +1 Forward was my baptism into this whole indie-game scene!

Started looking around after so many frustrating attempts to wrestle 5e into something I wanted to run for the tableâ€¦ turns out I wasnâ€™t alone

And yes @RichRogers, I feel like we could be friends. I so wish I could hop into one of your Bounty of the Week or Hutt Cartel gamesâ€¦ they seem exceedingly popular, though.

item.title: Finally joining the Gauntlet
item.dc:creator: @HorstWurst
item.description:
@HorstWurst wrote:

Hello @BattleDrumz and welcome aboard! I just started a solo play of Ironforged (liking it a lot) and Iâ€™m curious about coop mode (might try it with my more trad-minded home group). I would love to hear about your experience with the system after you have played. Also: reskinning systems to fit Star Wars is a time honored tradition on the Gauntlet. cough @RichRogers cough
